summary.span: 提供標準機能，用於建立及管理型別安全、已排序的 物件集合。

span.span: Provides standard facilities for creating and managing a type-safe, ordered collection of objects.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個集合預先配置的集合項目容量。

span.span: Gets or sets the preallocated collection item capacity for this collection.

value.span: 這個集合預先配置的集合項目容量。

span.span: The preallocated collection item capacity for this collection.
The default value is 8.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性表示的預先配置位置儲存在集合中，項目數目，而屬性表示的目前集合中的項目實際數目。The property represents the number of preallocated slots for storing items in this collection, whereas the property represents the actual number of items currently in the collection. 值一律為最小的值一樣大。The value of is always at least as large as the value of . 當新加入的集合項目造成集合計數超過集合的容量，容量會增加自動以容納新加入的集合項目。When newly added collection items cause the collection count to exceed the collection capacity, the capacity is increased automatically to accommodate the newly added collection items. 增加集合容量包括配置額外的集合的位置，而造成效能與記憶體額外負荷。Increasing the collection capacity involves allocating additional collection slots, which incurs both performance and memory overhead. 使用最佳化集合中的容量集合項目總計或最大數目事先知道的情況下的屬性。Use the property to optimize the collection capacity in cases where the total or maximum number of collection items is known in advance. 使用方法，讓目前的集合計數平均分配的集合產能。Use the method to cause the collection capacity to equalize with the current collection count.

exception.span: 嘗試將 的值設為小於 的目前值時引發。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set to a value that is less than the current value of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在呼叫的值屬性變成**0**和值屬性不變。After calling , the value of the property becomes **0** and the value of the property is unchanged. 若要設定新的容量，呼叫或明確設定新的容量，透過屬性。To set a new capacity, call or explicitly set a new capacity through the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public void TrimToSize ();
.method public hidebysig instance void TrimToSize() cil managed
Public Sub TrimToSize ()
public: void TrimToSize();

summary.span: 設定基礎集合 等於目前集合中之項目的 ，以便最佳化集合的記憶體用量。

span.span: Optimizes memory consumption for the collection by setting the underlying collection equal to the of items currently in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以用來為集合的記憶體負擔降至最低，特別是當集合中所包含的項目組必須是靜態。This method can be used to minimize memory overhead for a collection, particularly if the set of items contained by the collection is expected to be static.
